title: A major goal of wolf reintroduction to Yellowstone

content.question: Which of the following is a major goal of the program begun in 1995 to reintroduce the gray wolf into Yellowstone National Park?

choices.label: Decrease the number of grizzly bears, because they were becoming a nuisance
Enable the removal of the gray wolf from the endangered species list
Increase the dwindling numbers of tourists that visit the park each year
Upset the natural predator-prey balance between coyotes and elk
Decrease the number of sheep and cattle that wander into the park and overgraze the vegetation

content.answer: Enable the removal of the gray wolf from the endangered species list

skill.text: Skill 7.B: Describe potential responses or approaches to environmental problems.
